meanings.definition: Involving or causing bloodshed or violence.
meanings.sent1: The sanguinary battle left many wounded soldiers on the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The sanguinary criminal was known for his brutal acts of violence.
meanings.sent3: The sanguinary movie had so much fake blood that it looked comical.
meanings.sent4: The sanguinary conflict between the two rival gangs escalated quickly.
meanings.sent5: The sanguinary scene in the horror movie made viewers cover their eyes in fear.
